channel.title: male sterility on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in male sterility on funPlantGenes

item.title: BHLH51;ZmbHLH51

item.title: BnMS5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnMS5 Gene Name: MALE STERILITY 5 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Evolution of the Brassicaceae-specific MS5-Like family and neofunctionalization of the novel MALE STERILITY 5 gene essential for male fertility in Brassica napus.

item.title: BoPMEI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BoPMEI1 Gene Name: pectin methylesterase inhibitor Genome: Species: Brassica oleracea Functional Descriptions: BoPMEI1, a pollen-specific pectin methylesterase inhibitor, has an essential role in pollen tube growth.

item.title: BrGGL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA05g022470.3C Gene Symbol: BrGGL7 Gene Name: Genome: V3.

item.title: Capana10g000198
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana10g000198 Gene Symbol: Capana10g000198 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Gene expression and structure variation analyses indicate the Capana10g000198, encoding a R2R3-MYB transcription factor, is the best candidate gene for the msc-3 locus.

item.title: ClATM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla010576 Gene Symbol: ClATM1 Gene Name: Citrullus lanatus Abnormal Tapetum 1 Genome: latermelon database 97103 V1 (http://cucurbitgenomics.

item.title: CpMS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CpMS1 Gene Name: MALE STERILITY 1 Genome: Species: Carica papaya Functional Descriptions: No amplification of the CpMS1 gene was detected in any of the female flower samples, supporting the RNA-Seq results and CpMS1 participation on male flower organ development.

item.title: CsDUO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs1g03470 Gene Symbol: CsDUO1 Gene Name: DUO POLLEN 1 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The miR159a-DUO1 module regulates pollen development by modulating auxin biosynthesis and starch metabolism in citrus.

item.title: CsSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSUT1 Gene Name: Sucrose Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the Sucrose Transporter CsSUT1 Causes Male Sterility by Altering Carbohydrate Supply.

item.title: FvYUC6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FvYUC6 Gene Name: YUCCA6 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: Functionality of the FvYUC6 gene was studied in transgenic strawberry overexpressing FvYUC6, which showed typical high-auxin phenotypes.

item.title: GhAOC2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A08G004050.1 Gene Symbol: GhAOC2A Gene Name: allene oxide cyclase 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expression analysis of the GhAOC2 gene in HT-sensitive line (H05) and HT-tolerant line (84021) anthers at TS under NT and HT.

item.title: GhAOC2D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D08G004260.1 Gene Symbol: GhAOC2D Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expression analysis of the GhAOC2 gene in HT-sensitive line (H05) and HT-tolerant line (84021) anthers at TS under NT and HT.

item.title: GhCKI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCKI Gene Name: Gossypium hirsutum Casein kinase I Genome: TM-1 reference genome TM-1 Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCKI DNA methylation are all involved in HT-induced male sterility in cotton.

item.title: GhMYB4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A12G003840 Gene Symbol: GhMYB4 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome TM-1 Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: In the tapetum of early-stage cotton anthers, upregulated expression of GhMYB4 under HT and overexpressed GhMYB4 under normal temperature both led to severe male sterility phenotypes, coupled with enhanced expression of GhCKI.

item.title: GhMYB66
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D08G018460 Gene Symbol: GhMYB66 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhMYB66 interacts with GhMYB4 and promotes its binding to ProGhCKI.
